summary: In Hawaii, an undercover DEA agent and her civilian friend stumble upon a drug trafficking operation, and have to enlist the help of all their colleagues/friends to go after the vicious drug kingpin.
cast: Ronn Moss|Dona Speir|Hope Marie Carlton|Harold Diamond|Rodrigo Obregón|Cynthia Brimhall|Patty Duffek|Wolf Larson|Lory Green|Rustam Branaman|David DeShay|Michael A. Andrews|Kwan Hi Lim|Joseph Hieu|Peter Bromilow|Richard LePore|Glen Chin|Shawne Zarubica|Joey Meran|Bryn George|Hideo Su'a|Jamie Searle|Choya Pennington|Sue Don Lubin|Larry Don Lubin|Viviane Brahms|Maurice Brahms|John Dunne|Colleen Nakasone|Mike McKenzie|Darrell Davis|Ralph Riskin|Erick Schrum|Ross Simeona|Yukon King|Russell Howell|Cheryl Johnson|Andy Sidaris|Christian Drew Sidaris
title: Malibú connection
